problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D is the midpoint of BC, AE is the angular bisector of ∠BAC, AE ⊥ CE at point E. Connect DE. If AB = N_0, DE = N_1, then the length of AC is ()
raw_answer: 解:延长CE,交AB于点F．∵AE平分∠BAC,AE⊥CE,∴∠EAF=∠EAC,∠AEF=∠AEC,在△EAF与△EAC中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠AEF=∠EAC}\\{AE=AE}\\{∠AEF=∠AEC}\end{array}\right.,∴△EAF≌△EAC(ASA),∴AF=AC,EF=EC,又∵D是BC中点,∴BD=CD,∴DE是△BCF的中位线,∴BF=2DE=2．∴AC=AF=AB-BF=7-2=5；故选:A．
